title: cittam magizh
sahitya:
daNDapANi padam maravAdavarkku yama daNDanai kiDDaiydu ten pazhani


anupallavi

  aNDar munivar aDiyAr tiruk-kUTTamum ANDavanE hara haravena bhajikkum


caraNam    pAl abhiSEkam vibhUti abhiSEkam pArkka namadu iru kaN pOdumO
 KOdaNDapANi raghurAman maruganE shankaran maghanE muruganE guhanE jaya
